briefdescription.para: Initializes state with frequency grids corresponding to the given value of Lambda.

memberdef.argsstring: (const State< Q, false > &state_in, const double Lambda_in)
memberdef.name: State

briefdescription.para: Constructor, which gets a State (whose frequency grid will be copied) and Lambda (NO COPYING OF DATA!)

memberdef.argsstring: (const Vertex< Q, differentiated > &vertex_in, const SelfEnergy< Q > &selfenergy_in, const fRG_config &config_in, const double Lambda_in)
memberdef.name: State

briefdescription.para: Takes a single vertex and a single self-energy and puts them together into a new state. Needed for the parquet checks.
Element-wise division (needed for error estimate in ODE solver)

detaileddescription.para: Define a struct object which includes the self-energy and the vertex which are needed to evaluate the RHS of the flow equations.

Define essential data types: comp : complex number (complex<double>) glb_i : imaginary unit vec : vector class with additional functionality such as element-wise operations, real/imag part etc. VertexInput : auxiliary struct that contains all input variables of vertices
Functions to write/read a State object to/from an HDF5 file.
